definition: to make excuses/to give an excuse (for not doing something)
to use all sorts of excuses
to plead/to claim as an excuse
variant of 推諉|推诿[tui1 wei3]
to joke/to laugh insincerely/to make merry/to talk irrelevantly
(idiom) to talk in a roundabout way to cover up the truth/evasive
to argue strenuously or with sophistry/to quibble
